text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a FLVR

name: RoleClassFlavorAdditive
title: RoleClassFlavorAdditive
description: A substance (player) added to a mixture (scoper) to make it taste a certain way. In food the use is obvious, in pharmaceuticals flavors can hide disgusting taste of the active ingredient (important in pediatric treatments).
